titleStmt.title: A treatise of the felicitie, of the life to come Vnsavorie to the obstinate, alluring to such as are gone astray, and to the faithful, full of consolation. By A.H.
titleStmt.author: Hume, Alexander, 1560?-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, printer to the Kings Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio Regali.
Running title reads: The felicitie of the life to come.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
